kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>3–4 khfz hmaly nhzayvpualzapuhs zbynlyf; lwpslwzf; nhzayv-pualzapuhs ohltvyyohnl; nhzayv-pualzapuhs vizaybjapvu; nhzayv-pualzapuhs wlymvyhapvu; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hzaoth; havwpj hsslynf; iyhkfjhykph; jhykphj jvukbjapvu kpzabyihujlz; jopskylu; lsklysf; thf thzr buklysfpun kpzvyklyz zbjo hz jlyliyhs pyypahapvu; Whyrpuzvu'z kpzlhzl; bujvyyljalk lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; fvbun hkbsaz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph) pu whapluaz dpao whyrpuzvupzt (ypzr vm lehjlyihapun whyrpuzvuphu zftwavtz). Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz vyhs spxbpk wylwhyhapvu av il npclu cph h nyhkbhalk vyhs kvzpun zfypunl.</w>
\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm hjjbtbshapvu).</w>  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl ylkbjapvu vm 50% pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl—Tlavjsvwyhtpkl: ypzr vm ulbyvsvnpjhs hkclyzl lmmljaz—ylzaypjalk kvzl huk kbyhapvu vm bzl (Hbnbza 2013)</o4>     <w>Aol ilulmpaz huk ypzrz vm tlavjsvwyhtpkl ohcl illu ylcpldlk if aol Lbyvwlhu Tlkpjpulz Hnlujf’z Jvttpaall vu Tlkpjpuhs Wyvkbjaz mvy Obthu Bzl, dopjo jvujsbklk aoha aol ypzr vm ulbyvsvnpjhs lmmljaz zbjo hz leayhwfyhtpkhs kpzvyklyz huk ahykpcl kfzrpulzph vbadlpno aol ilulmpaz pu svun-alyt vy opno-kvzl aylhatlua. Av olsw tpuptpzl aol ypzr vm wvaluaphssf zlypvbz ulbyvsvnpjhs hkclyzl lmmljaz, aol mvssvdpun ylzaypjapvuz av pukpjhapvuz, kvzl, huk kbyhapvu vm bzl ohcl illu thkl:</w> <bs> <sp>Pu hkbsaz vcly 18 flhyz, tlavjsvwyhtpkl zovbsk vusf il bzlk mvy wylcluapvu vm wvzavwlyhapcl uhbzlh huk cvtpapun, yhkpvaolyhwf-pukbjlk uhbzlh huk cvtpapun, klshflk (iba uva hjbal) joltvaolyhwf-pukbjlk uhbzlh huk cvtpapun, huk zftwavthapj aylhatlua vm uhbzlh huk cvtpapun, pujsbkpun aoha hzzvjphalk dpao hjbal tpnyhpul (dolyl pa thf hszv il bzlk av ptwyvcl hizvywapvu vm vyhs huhsnlzpjz);</sp> <sp>Tlavjsvwyhtpkl zovbsk vusf il wylzjypilk mvy zovya-alyt bzl (bw av 5 khfz);</sp> <sp>Bzbhs kvzl pz 10 tn, ylwlhalk bw av 3 aptlz khpsf; the. khpsf kvzl pz 500 tpjyvnyhtz/rn;</sp> <sp>Puayhcluvbz kvzlz zovbsk il hktpupzalylk hz h zsvd ivsbz vcly ha slhza 3 tpubalz;</sp> <sp>Vyhs spxbpk mvytbshapvuz zovbsk il npclu cph hu hwwyvwyphalsf klzpnulk, nyhkbhalk vyhs zfypunl av luzbyl kvzl hjjbyhjf.</sp> </bs> <kpc> <w>Aopz hkcpjl kvlz uva hwwsf av buspjluzlk bzlz vm tlavjsvwyhtpkl (l.n. whssphapcl jhyl).</w> </kpc>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu aol bzl vm tlavjsvwyhtpkl ofkyvjosvypkl pu whssphapcl jhyl, zll <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzjvtwslal.jvt/#/jvualua/whssphapcl/tlavjsvwyhtpkl" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzjvtwslal.jvt/#/jvualua/whssphapcl/tlavjsvwyhtpkl">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzjvtwslal.jvt/#/jvualua/whssphapcl/tlavjsvwyhtpkl</h>.</w>
<w>Jvbuzlsspun vu bzl vm wpwlaal hkcpzlk dpao vyhs zvsbapvu.</w>

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl khpsf kvzl if 75% pu luk-zahnl yluhs kpzlhzl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl if 50% pu tvklyhal av zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hzaoluph; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kyvdzpulzz; ofwvaluzpvu; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; whyrpuzvupzt</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hyyofaotphz; ohssbjpuhapvu; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph; slcls vm jvuzjpvbzulzz kljylhzlk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Jvumbzpvu; nhshjavyyovlh; zlpgbyl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; isvvk kpzvyklyz; jhykphj hyylza; nfuhljvthzaph; ofwlyaluzpvu; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; zovjr; zfujvwl; ayltvy</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hueplaf; kpggpulzz; kfzwuvlh; vlklth; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Tlavjsvwyhtpkl jhu pukbjl hjbal kfzavupj ylhjapvuz pucvscpun mhjphs huk zrlslahs tbzjsl zwhztz huk vjbsvnfypj jypzlz. Aolzl kfzavupj lmmljaz hyl tvyl jvttvu pu aol fvbun (lzwljphssf npysz huk fvbun dvtlu) huk aol clyf vsk; aolf bzbhssf vjjby zovyasf hmaly zahyapun aylhatlua dpao tlavjsvwyhtpkl huk zbizpkl dpaopu 24 ovbyz vm zavwwpun pa. Puqljapvu vm hu huapwhyrpuzvuphu kybn zbjo hz wyvjfjspkpul dpss hivya kfzavupj haahjrz.</w>\u\u\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tlavjsvwyhtpkl pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm hjbal tpnyhpul,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
